verses.verse: Call <WH7121> <WH8798> now, if there be <WH3426> any that will answer <WH6030> <WH8802> thee; and to which of the saints <WH6918> wilt thou turn <WH6437> <WH8799> ?
For wrath <WH3708> killeth <WH2026> <WH8799> the foolish man <WH191>, and envy <WH7068> slayeth <WH4191> <WH8686> the silly one <WH6601> <WH8802>.
I have seen <WH7200> <WH8804> the foolish <WH191> taking root <WH8327> <WH8688>: but suddenly <WH6597> I cursed <WH5344> <WH8799> his habitation <WH5116>.
His children <WH1121> are far <WH7368> <WH8799> from safety <WH3468>, and they are crushed <WH1792> <WH8691> in the gate <WH8179>, neither is there any to deliver <WH5337> <WH8688> them.

Whose harvest <WH7105> the hungry <WH7457> eateth up <WH398> <WH8799>, and taketh <WH3947> <WH8799> it even out <WH413> of the tshofars <WH6791>, and the robber <WH6782> swalloweth up <WH7602> <WH8804> their substance <WH2428>.
Although affliction <WH205> cometh not forth <WH3318> <WH8799> of the dust <WH6083>, neither doth trouble <WH5999> spring out <WH6779> <WH8799> of the ground <WH127>;
Yet man <WH120> is born <WH3205> <WH8795> unto trouble <WH5999>, as the sparks <WH1121> <WH7565> fly <WH5774> <WH8800> upward <WH1361> <WH8686>.
I would seek <WH199> <WH1875> <WH8799> unto 'Elohim <WH410>, and unto 'Elohim <WH430> would I commit <WH7760> <WH8799> my cause <WH1700>:
Which doeth <WH6213> <WH8802> great things <WH1419> and unsearchable <WH369> <WH2714>; marvellous things <WH6381> <WH8737> without number <WH4557>:
Who giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> rain <WH4306> upon <WH6440> the earth <WH776>, and sendeth <WH7971> <WH8802> waters <WH4325> upon <WH6440> the fields <WH2351>:
To set up <WH7760> <WH8800> on high <WH4791> those that be low <WH8217>; that those which mourn <WH6937> <WH8802> may be exalted <WH7682> <WH8804> to safety <WH3468>.
He disappointeth <WH6565> <WH8688> the devices <WH4284> of the crafty <WH6175>, so that their hands <WH3027> cannot perform <WH6213> <WH8799> their enterprise <WH8454>.
He taketh <WH3920> <WH8802> the wise <WH2450> in their own craftiness <WH6193>: and the counsel <WH6098> of the froward <WH6617> <WH8737> is carried headlong <WH4116> <WH8737>.
They meet <WH6298> <WH8762> with darkness <WH2822> in the daytime <WH3119>, and grope <WH4959> <WH8762> in the noonday <WH6672> as in the night <WH3915>.
But he saveth <WH3467> <WH8686> the poor <WH34> from the sword <WH2719>, from their mouth <WH6310>, and from the hand <WH3027> of the mighty <WH2389>.
So the poor <WH1800> hath hope <WH8615>, and iniquity <WH5766> stoppeth <WH7092> <WH8804> her mouth <WH6310>.
Behold, happy <WH835> is the man <WH582> whom 'Elohim <WH433> correcteth <WH3198> <WH8686>: therefore despise <WH3988> <WH8799> not thou the chastening <WH4148> of 'El SHaddai <WH7706>:
For he maketh sore <WH3510> <WH8686>, and bindeth up <WH2280> <WH8799>: he woundeth <WH4272> <WH8799>, and his hands <WH3027> make whole <WH7495> <WH8799>.
He shall deliver <WH5337> <WH8686> thee in six <WH8337> troubles <WH6869>: yea, in seven <WH7651> there shall no evil <WH7451> touch <WH5060> <WH8799> thee.
In famine <WH7458> he shall redeem <WH6299> <WH8804> thee from death <WH4194>: and in war <WH4421> from the power <WH3027> of the sword <WH2719>.
Thou shalt be hid <WH2244> <WH8735> from the scourge <WH7752> of the tongue <WH3956>: neither shalt thou be afraid <WH3372> <WH8799> of destruction <WH7701> when it cometh <WH935> <WH8799>.
At destruction <WH7701> and famine <WH3720> thou shalt laugh <WH7832> <WH8799>: neither shalt thou be afraid <WH3372> <WH8799> of the beasts <WH2416> of the earth <WH776>.
For thou shalt be in league <WH1285> with the stones <WH68> of the field <WH7704>: and the beasts <WH2416> of the field <WH7704> shall be at peace <WH7999> <WH8717> with thee.
And thou shalt know <WH3045> <WH8804> that thy tabernacle <WH168> shall be in peace <WH7965>; and thou shalt visit <WH6485> <WH8804> thy habitation <WH5116>, and shalt not sin <WH2398> <WH8799>.
Thou shalt know <WH3045> <WH8804> also that thy seed <WH2233> shall be great <WH7227>, and thine offspring <WH6631> as the grass <WH6212> of the earth <WH776>.
Thou shalt come <WH935> <WH8799> to thy grave <WH6913> in a full age <WH3624>, like as a shock of corn <WH1430> cometh in <WH5927> <WH8800> in his season <WH6256>.
Lo this, we have searched <WH2713> <WH8804> it, so it is; hear <WH8085> <WH8798> it, and know <WH3045> <WH8798> thou it for thy good.
